verses.kjv: Children, obey your parents in the Lord: for this is right.
verses.web: Children, obey your parents in the Lord, for this is right.
verses.ct: Children, obey your parents as the Lord wants you to, because this is the right thing to do.

verses.kjv: Honour thy father and mother; which is the first commandment with promise;
verses.web: “Honor your father and mother,” which is the first commandment with a promise:
verses.ct: "Honor your father and mother" — this is the first commandment that comes with a promise:

verses.kjv: That it may be well with thee, and thou mayest live long on the earth.
verses.web: “that it may be well with you, and you may live long on the earth.”
verses.ct: "so that things will go well for you, and you will live a long life on the earth."

verses.kjv: And, ye fathers, provoke not your children to wrath: but bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord.
verses.web: You fathers, don’t provoke your children to wrath, but nurture them in the discipline and instruction of the Lord.
verses.ct: Fathers, don't push your children to the point of anger. Instead, raise them with the discipline and instruction that comes from the Lord.

verses.kjv: Servants, be obedient to them that are your masters according to the flesh, with fear and trembling, in singleness of your heart, as unto Christ;
verses.web: Servants, be obedient to those who according to the flesh are your masters, with fear and trembling, in singleness of your heart, as to Christ,
verses.ct: Servants, obey your earthly masters with deep respect and sincerity of heart, as if you were serving Christ himself.

verses.kjv: Not with eyeservice, as menpleasers; but as the servants of Christ, doing the will of God from the heart;
verses.web: not in the way of service only when eyes are on you, as men pleasers, but as servants of Christ, doing the will of God from the heart,
verses.ct: Don't just work hard when they're watching to impress them. Instead, work as servants of Christ, doing God's will from the heart.

verses.kjv: With good will doing service, as to the Lord, and not to men:
verses.web: with good will doing service as to the Lord, and not to men,
verses.ct: Serve with genuine enthusiasm, as though you're working for the Lord and not for people.

verses.kjv: Knowing that whatsoever good thing any man doeth, the same shall he receive of the Lord, whether he be bond or free.
verses.web: knowing that whatever good thing each one does, he will receive the same good again from the Lord, whether he is bound or free.
verses.ct: Remember that the Lord will reward every person for whatever good they do, whether they are slave or free.

verses.kjv: And, ye masters, do the same things unto them, forbearing threatening: knowing that your Master also is in heaven; neither is there respect of persons with him.
verses.web: You masters, do the same things to them, and give up threatening, knowing that he who is both their Master and yours is in heaven, and there is no partiality with him.
verses.ct: Masters, treat your servants the same way. Stop threatening them. Remember that both you and they share the same Master in heaven, and he shows no favoritism.

verses.kjv: Finally, my brethren, be strong in the Lord, and in the power of his might.
verses.web: Finally, be strong in the Lord, and in the strength of his might.
verses.ct: Finally, be strong in the Lord and in his mighty power.

verses.kjv: Put on the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil.
verses.web: Put on the whole armor of God, that you may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil.
verses.ct: Put on the full armor of God so that you can stand firm against the devil's schemes.

verses.kjv: For we wrestle not against flesh and blood, but against principalities, against powers, against the rulers of the darkness of this world, against spiritual wickedness in high places.
verses.web: For our wrestling is not against flesh and blood, but against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of the darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of wickedness in the heavenly places.
verses.ct: Our fight is not against other human beings. It is against rulers and authorities, against the powers that govern the darkness of this world, against spiritual forces of wickedness in the heavenly places.

verses.kjv: Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day, and having done all, to stand.
verses.web: Therefore put on the whole armor of God, that you may be able to withstand in the evil day, and having done all, to stand.
verses.ct: So put on the full armor of God. Then when the day of evil comes, you will be able to hold your ground, and after you have done everything possible, you will still be standing.

verses.kjv: Stand therefore, having your loins girt about with truth, and having on the breastplate of righteousness;
verses.web: Stand therefore, having the utility belt of truth buckled around your waist, and having put on the breastplate of righteousness,
verses.ct: Stand firm, then, with the belt of truth buckled around your waist and the breastplate of righteousness protecting your chest.

verses.kjv: And your feet shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace;
verses.web: and having fitted your feet with the preparation of the Good News of peace,
verses.ct: Fit your feet with the readiness that comes from the gospel of peace.

verses.kjv: Above all, taking the shield of faith, wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked.
verses.web: above all, taking up the shield of faith, with which you will be able to quench all the fiery darts of the evil one.
verses.ct: Above all, take up the shield of faith, which will let you extinguish every flaming arrow the evil one fires at you.

verses.kjv: And take the helmet of salvation, and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God:
verses.web: And take the helmet of salvation, and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God;
verses.ct: Take the helmet of salvation and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God.

verses.kjv: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit, and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints;
verses.web: with all prayer and requests, praying at all times in the Spirit, and being watchful to this end in all perseverance and requests for all the saints:
verses.ct: Pray at all times in the Spirit with every kind of prayer and request. Stay alert and never give up as you pray for all of God's people.

verses.kjv: And for me, that utterance may be given unto me, that I may open my mouth boldly, to make known the mystery of the gospel,
verses.web: on my behalf, that utterance may be given to me in opening my mouth, to make known with boldness the mystery of the Good News,
verses.ct: Pray for me too — that whenever I open my mouth, God will give me the right words to boldly make known the mystery of the gospel.

verses.kjv: For which I am an ambassador in bonds: that therein I may speak boldly, as I ought to speak.
verses.web: for which I am an ambassador in chains; that in it I may speak boldly, as I ought to speak.
verses.ct: I am an ambassador for this gospel, even though I'm currently in chains. Pray that I will speak it as boldly as I should.

verses.kjv: But that ye also may know my affairs, and how I do, Tychicus, a beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord, shall make known to you all things:
verses.web: But that you also may know my affairs, how I am doing, Tychicus, the beloved brother and faithful servant in the Lord, will make known to you all things.
verses.ct: Tychicus, a dear brother and faithful servant in the Lord, will tell you everything about how I'm doing and what's happening with me.

verses.kjv: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose, that ye might know our affairs, and that he might comfort your hearts.
verses.web: I have sent him to you for this very purpose, that you may know our state and that he may comfort your hearts.
verses.ct: I'm sending him to you for this very reason — so you can know how we are and so he can encourage your hearts.

verses.kjv: Peace be to the brethren, and love with faith, from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
verses.web: Peace be to the brothers, and love with faith, from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
verses.ct: Peace to the brothers and sisters, and love with faith, from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

verses.kjv: Grace be with all them that love our Lord Jesus Christ in sincerity. Amen.
verses.web: Grace be with all those who love our Lord Jesus Christ with incorruptible love. Amen.
verses.ct: May grace be with everyone who loves our Lord Jesus Christ with an undying love. Amen.
